Unique identifier for Custom Action: This IAM role must have proper permissions.
GitHub Repo to pull from. Only the Name. not the URL
Branch to use from Repo. Only the Name. not the URL
S3 bucket to use for artifacts. Just bucket Name; not URL. IAM user should have access to the bucket.
Secret. It might look something like 9b189a1654643522561f7b3ebd44a1531a4287af OAuthToken with access to Repo. Go to https://github.com/settings/tokens
